## Client.resume() method

`resume` changes the synchronization mode of the given document to realtime.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resume(doc: Observable<unknown>): Promise<Observable<unknown>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  doc | Observable&lt;unknown&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Observable&lt;unknown&gt;&gt;
